## R package

[`Documentation`](my_vignette.html) [`Source Code`](https://github.com/alvesand/qmtsvr)


## R scripts  

* [easymanh](https://github.com/alvesand/easymanh): A simple and flexible function for displaying Manhattan plots using different scores.  

* [train.nn](https://github.com/alvesand/train.nn): A simplified R function for training a Multi-layer Perceptron Neural Network with Gradient Descent optimization and L2-norm regularization for regression analysis.  

* [simdom](https://github.com/alvesand/simdom): An R script for generating simulated datasets with dominance effects using QMSim outputs.
